title: Edit or delete a login with the Firefox Password Manager
summary: How to edit or delete your saved and synced logins in Firefox for desktop.
html:
Firefox's built-in password management lets you access and manage your passwords quickly and securely. When you visit a web page and click on the login field, Firefox will suggest your saved logins for that page.

  1. Click the menu button to open the menu panel.
  2. Click Logins and PasswordsPasswords. The about:logins page will open in a new tab.
  3. Go to the login entry you want to edit or remove (use the search box or scroll through the list on the left).
    • Click Edit to change your login information.
    • To remove the login information from Firefox, click Remove.
